aboutUs.headline: ABOUT US...
aboutUs.content:
Hello, we are HA24B, and this is our student company, "Baller los," which means "go full throttle" – and that's exactly what we're doing.

We are 24 students aged between 15 and 18 years.

We founded this student company as part of the one-year vocational school for business at BBS I Lüneburg.

We are creating our own game and aim to raise awareness about environmental protection, especially concerning bodies of water, through this game.

It's only natural that we produce our game as environmentally friendly and high-quality as possible.

We use a 3D printer with recyclable and even recycled filament to manufacture our game pieces ourselves. Other materials, such as the game board and packaging, are recyclable or made from recycled materials.

Additionally, we investigate the pollution of the Ilmenau River (which flows through Lüneburg) by collecting and counting plastic waste.

For this website, we collaborate with the Lüneburg-based IT company "webnetz" and the IT specialist trainees in their third year of training from the IT22B class at our school.

headline.content: A student-run business from BBS 1 Lüneburg with extra value
